com.bigdata.search

Interface IHitCollector<V extends Comparable<V>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - The generic type of the document identifier.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiTokenHitCollector, SingleTokenHitCollector

    public interface IHitCollector<V extends Comparable<V>>
    Interface used to collect Hits from the ReadIndexTask. Switched over to this interface to allow for an optimization when only one token is presented for search - in this case we now use a simple array of hits rather than a heavyweight ConcurrentHashMap.
    Author:
    mikepersonick

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Hit<V>[] getHits()
      Returns an array of hits collected by this instance.
      Hit<V> putIfAbsent(V v, Hit<V> hit)
      Mimic the ConcurrentHashMap method.

    • Method Detail

      • putIfAbsent

        Hit<V> putIfAbsent(V v,
                 Hit<V> hit)
        Mimic the ConcurrentHashMap method.

        See ConcurrentHashMap.putIfAbsent(Object, Object).

        Parameters:
        v - the document identifier for the hit
        hit - the full text hit
        Returns:
        the old value or null if there was no old value

      • getHits

        Hit<V>[] getHits()
        Returns an array of hits collected by this instance.
